title: Mike Morse to Receive Spirit of Detroit Award for Backpack Donations
text:
Mike Morse Law Firm
SOUTHFIELD, Mich. , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- On Tuesday, October 20 , the Detroit City Council will present Attorney Mike Morse with an award which celebrates the heart, generosity, character and commitment that the statue after which it was named embodies: The Spirit of Detroit .
Given to honor individuals or organizations for outstanding achievement or service to the citizens of Detroit , The Spirit of Detroit Award will be presented to Mr. Morse for his donation of 23,000 backpacks full of school supplies to every Detroit Public Schools student in grades K through 5.
With so many families, both locally and nationally, living below the poverty level, the luxury of proper school supplies is out of the reach of many children. As a result, the disadvantages a child faces in school are even greater and his or her chances for success are greatly diminished.
Mr. Morse explained, "As the father of three girls, I know how important and exciting the first day of school can be. I want it to be that way for every kid. My firm's and my goal is to increase a child's chances by leveling the playing field right from the outset. We want to let them know that someone cares."
While Mr. Morse and his law firm continue their drive to secure donations for more students both in and outside of Detroit , he is pleased and humbled to receive recognition for his efforts thus far.
" The Spirit of Detroit statue has always been an inspiring landmark to me," Morse explained. "It represents everything that makes this city great, from generosity and character to passion and tenacity. To receive this award for simply repaying the city that has already given me so much feels like a double win for me. I am honored, to say the least."
The award presentation meeting will take place at 10:00 am on Tuesday, October 20 on the 13 th floor of the Coleman A. Young Municipal Center, 2 Woodward Avenue, Detroit , 48226. Members of the public are welcome to participate.
The Mike Morse Law Firm is Michigan's largest personal injury firm, specializing in Auto and Social Security Disability Claims. The firm handles cases statewide, with the main office in Southfield, Michigan .
If you or your company would like to help with the ongoing school supplies effort, visit 855MikeWins.com to learn more.
